Metaverse makers organization

We are artists, creatives, and coders on a mission; Show the World the open metaverse with the sickest creator-driven web3 products.

WE BELIEVE

In the metaverse, all digital objects and identities should interoperate in virtual worlds. Every digital object should be an NFT belonging to an owner with multiple representations across the metaverse - 2D, 3D as well as interactive and intelligent (AI) ones.

NFTs are a Schelling point for creator-driven games and virtual worlds. They decouple content from game engines and platforms, replacing them with standard formats and protocols that can stand the test of time. Creators are the lifeblood of the metaverse and NFTs are the funding mechanism.

The metaverse is an “Internet Cinematic Universe”: a medium controlled by creators, accessed through free and open tools, linked together into one cohesive reality, and best of all -- fun.

As makers and residents, we want to show the way to the open metaverse with stunning technology, tools, experiences, and drops.

WEBAVERSE: METAVERSE ENGINE

Wouldn't it be great to have a 100% open source web3 metaverse engine that anyone can host; an engine that could shift the power from a few big tech companies to users and creators? And what if it could load any NFT from the dWeb with slick avatar rigging for AR/VR and much more?

We thought it would be kind of cool. So, we made it.

UPSTREET: METAVERSE GAME

The most fun you’ll ever have in an MMO: sculpted by digital artisans, designed with AI, powered by NFTs, built by us; all of us, together.

The Upstreet is a fun, achievable vision of a world for future virtual world existence, one which is built on principles and is fun. Get ready to dive into The Street!

COLLABS: DECENTRALISED COORDINATION

We love bringing to life metaverse projects with drops. We partner with creators for immersive drops and craft end to end experiences which make their way into the game and onto The Street.
